invite_followers_text.en: Spread your link and receive a bonus [[slot_icon_coin]] at the start of the game for each follower! Copy this link to your clipboard: [[bot_invite_url]] The bonus is credited once every {1} hours if the subscriber play into the game once every {2} hours. Maximum of {3} subscribers are taken into account per start

bonus_for_followers_invite.en: Added more friends to the Treasure Trip game 🍄 [[invite_followers_text]]

no_followers.en:
No followers 😰
Invite your friends, it will be interesting!

follower_himself_error.en: You can't subscribe to yourself... Spread link for friends: [[bot_invite_url]] And receive a bonus [[slot_icon_coin]] at the start of the game.

new_registration.en: Treasure Trip {0} new registration. Set your name prefix please:

help_text_bug.en: Treasure Trip - the game and adventures in a medieval setting, fight and collect [[slot_icon_coin]] coins! [[slot_icon_enemy]] is Enemy, if you see him, you will have to [[action_fight]] or [[action_run]] [[action_fight]] with him cost -2 [[slot_icon_live]] Lives or [[action_run]] cost -1 [[slot_icon_live]] Lives But if you have [[slot_icon_armor]] Armor you will lost -1 [[slot_icon_live]] Lives and -1 [[slot_icon_armor]] Armor per one [[slot_icon_enemy]] Enemy... If you see [[slot_icon_shop]], welcome to shopping, tap to the [[action_shop]]...

help_text.en: [[slot_icon_item_smarty_hat]] - Treasure Trip is simple, you will be collect [[slot_icon_coin]] coins and unlock new levels [[map_icon]]. [[slot_icon_enemy]] - is Enemy, if you see him, you will have to [[action_fight]] or [[action_run]] [[action_fight]] with him cost -2 [[slot_icon_live]] Lives or [[action_run]] cost -1 [[slot_icon_live]] Lives But if you have [[slot_icon_armor]] armor, it will reduce the damage by half... If you weill be see [[slot_icon_shop]][[slot_icon_items_shop]], welcome to shopping... More information /help

help_text2.en: Treasure Trip - is a game set in a medieval world. Fight and collect [[slot_icon_coin]] coins! The game consists of locations with {0} levels each. The location determines the type of enemies, buildings, and resources you will encounter. Each level [[map_icon]] has 4 game fields with randomly placed enemies {1}, resources [[slot_icon_live]][[slot_icon_coin]][[slot_icon_armor]], and buildings [[slot_icon_shop]][[slot_icon_items_shop]][[slot_icon_slot_machine]]. - If there are no enemies, collect all resources and use the buildings. - If you encounter an enemy, you must choose to [[action_fight]] or [[action_run]]. - [[action_run]]: Costs -1 [[slot_icon_live]] Life and forfeits any resources on the field. - [[action_fight]]: Depends on your weapon, the type of enemy, and your [[slot_icon_armor]] armor. Defeated enemies may drop resources. Ranking 🏆 is based on the number of levels [[map_icon]] completed. Resources: [[slot_icon_live]] Lives - if you have them, your journey continues. [[slot_icon_live]] {2} at the start. [[slot_icon_coin]] Coins - for the to spend in the shops. [[slot_icon_coin]] {3} at the start. [[slot_icon_armor]] Armor - reduces damage by half. [[slot_icon_armor]] {4} at the start. Items: {5} Buildings: - 🏠 Life and armor shop. Inventory varies with the number of 🏠 on the field (up to 3 shops). - ‚õ∫️ Weapon shop. - 🎰 Casino, where players can test their luck. Enemies: {6} Goog Luck

about_info.en: Treasure Trip - The game was made by Sergei Lazarev and Alexander Vanyukov, thanks for your attention. For contact: novuscolor@gmail.com

no_action_need_fight.en: First you need to defeat all enemies...

username_is_empty.en: Error: username is empty, specify the username after the command

restart_question.en: Treasure Trip restart? You will lose your current progress in the game.

error_no_username.en:
To play the game, it is necessary to create a username on Telegram.
1. Click on the three horizontal lines 'Settings' in the button left corner.
2. From the menu options, select 'Edit' in the top left corner.
3. Find 'Add username'.
4. Provide a unique name.
